page.title: 07EVENTS
page.content: Every year Birtley Grenadiers Jazz Band holds a carnival. Which is a sort of competition between different Jazz Bands. It is held at the Community Centre Birtley. The manager and trainer are called Daisy and Joe McKenna who live on Vigo estate and the rest of the band live all around them. There are 6O members and they play the gazoo a sort of trumpet, drums and the big bass drum and there is also flag corners. The carnival was held on Sunday 21st April 1985. As Birtley is the host band they cannot compete as if they win it would seem unfair. So Birtley Jazz Band can only go on display for practice, and show off their routine and impress the other bands. Another annual event is the fairground that comes to Barley Mow in mid June. It has a variety of rides and stalls.
